fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints

Class EndPoint<I>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.sorbonne_u.components.endpoints.EndPoint<I>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AbstractEndPointI, EndPointI<I>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BCMEndPoint, POJOEndPoint, RESTEndPoint

    public abstract class EndPoint<I>
extends java.lang.Object
implements EndPointI<I>
    The abstract class EndPoint provides a baseline partial implementation of an end point, to be extended to fully implement actual implementation-dependent end points.

    Description

    White-box Invariant

     invariant       implementedInterface != null

    Black-box Invariant

     invariant       true        // no invariant

    Created on : 2024-07-12

    Author:
    Jacques Malenfant
